title: Compare demographic pressures based on development

content.question: In the developed and developing worlds, respectively, the greatest demographic pressures on policy come from which of the following?

choices.label:
Developed - Overpopulation
Developing - High death rates

Developed - High birth rates
Developing - Emigration

unit.text: 5: Political and Economic Changes and Development

topic.text: 5.8: Causes and Effects of Demographic Change

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Compare political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
